item.title: Bank of America hikes Carvana price target following S&P 500 inclusion announcement
item.description: Bank of America sees shares of Carvana adding 14% from here.

item.title: Netflix gets a downgrade after announcing Warner Bros. film and streaming acquisition
item.description: Analyst Jeffrey Wlodarczak downgraded the streaming stock to a hold rating from buy.

item.title: Huge Wall Street call: Morgan Stanley's new Tesla analyst downgrades stock over valuation concerns
item.description: The analyst downgraded Tesla's stock to equal weight from overweight.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts favor these 3 stocks for their growth potential
item.description: TipRanks' ranking service highlights three stocks, including Credo Technology and Walmart.

item.title: Chinese internet companies are ramping AI spending. These local players may benefit
item.description: Chinese internet companies increasingly say they don't have enough compute to power their artificial intelligence ambitions.
